bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/semi-integrated head tube, butted & formed top tube, hydroformed down tube w/integrated gusset, bridgeless seatstay, forged race dropouts & replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Bontrager Race Lite Pro TLR Disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 135x5mm rear hub, 28 hole, center lock, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race X Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA Orbit Z, 1-1/8" threadless, semi-integrated, semi-cartridge bearings
Shimano Deore XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes
